docs.snippet: Opposition to government benefits is based on a false premise that aid fails....
docs.lead_paragraph: Opposition to government benefits is based on a false premise that aid fails.
docs.abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column observes 50th anniversary of America's war on poverty; holds while some consider war unwinnable, evidence shows that antipoverty measures enacted over last half decade have made a difference, although change has been slow; lists several antipoverty programs that have had clear impact.

headline.main: Progress in the War on Poverty
headline.print_headline: Progress in the War on Poverty

docs.snippet: The attorney for a woman who accused star Florida State quarterback Jameis Winston of sexual assault said Thursday that she intends to sue the school, the Tallahassee Police Department and the player himself....
docs.lead_paragraph: The attorney for a woman who accused star Florida State quarterback Jameis Winston of sexual assault said Thursday that she intends to sue the school, the Tallahassee Police Department and the player himself.

headline.main: FSU and Its Star QB Winston Could Face Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: FSU and Its Star QB Winston Could Face Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Gov. Peter Shumlin devoted his entire State of the State speech to Vermont’s “full-blown heroin crisis.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Peter Shumlin devoted his entire State of the State speech to Vermont’s “full-blown heroin crisis.”
docs.abstract: Vermont Gov Peter Shumlin devotes his entire State of the State Message to epidemic of heroin addiction in the state; says he wants to encourage officials to respond to addiction as a chronic disease, rather than with only punishment and incarceration.

headline.main: In Annual Speech, Vermont Governor Shifts Focus to Drug Abuse
headline.print_headline: In Annual Speech, Vermont Governor Shifts Focus to Drug Abuse

docs.snippet: A series of emails shows that aides to Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey told officials to close lanes on the George Washington Bridge, in what appeared to be political retribution....
docs.lead_paragraph: A series of emails shows that aides to Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey told officials to close lanes on the George Washington Bridge, in what appeared to be political retribution.
docs.abstract: Series of emails shows that aides to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie ordered George Washington Bridge lane closings that turned Fort Lee, NJ, into a parking lot for four days in Sept 2013; action appears to have been political retribution toward Fort Lee Mayor Mark Sokolich after he did not endorse the governor for re-election; revelation has exploded into full-bore scandal for Christie.

headline.main: Christie Faces Scandal on Traffic Jam Aides Ordered
headline.print_headline: Christie Faces Scandal on Traffic Jam

byline.contributor: William K. Rashbaum and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: If an “American Idol” also-ran can have his own page on the online encyclopedia, is there no limit? Apparently there is, as some people find out the hard way....
docs.lead_paragraph: If an “American Idol” also-ran can have his own page on the online encyclopedia, is there no limit? Apparently there is, as some people find out the hard way.
docs.abstract: Getting and maintaining a personal Wikipedia page is a harder task than one would think.

headline.seo: Wikipedia, What Does Judith Newman Have to Do to Get a Page?
